example.description: This example removes the IAM user Bob from the group Testers.

example.code: $groups = Get-IAMGroupForUser -UserName Theresa foreach ($group in $groups) { Remove-IAMUserFromGroup -GroupName $group.GroupName -UserName Theresa -Force }
example.description: This example finds any groups of which IAM user Theresa is a member, and then removes Theresa from those groups.
This example shows an alternate way of removing the IAM user Bob from the Testers group.
